questions: (a) What is sustainable development ? Why is it necessary ? (b) What is water harvesting ? List its four benefits.
answers: (a) Sustainable development : Development which meets the current basic human needs, while preserving the resources for the needs of future generation. It is necessary for environment conservation. (b) Water harvesting — It is method to capture every trickle of water that falls on the land. (i) Recharges wells/ Ground water (ii) Provides moisture for vegetation (iii) It is not lost by evaporation (iv) It does not provide a breeding place for mosquitoes (v) Prevents ground water from contamination due to human and animal wastes.
